categories: Category:Missions of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A mission was undertaken by a diplomatic party of the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War to the Inner Rim planet Kyrouac.

The mission to Kyrouac was introduced in Alone Against the Empire, a solitaire roleplaying adventure written by Lester W. Smith for use with West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and published in Challenge 32 in 1988. Since the adventure was released outside of the Lucas Licensing process, its canonicity within the Star Wars Legends continuity was never confirmed.
